body:
Hello Avicastians!
well, I'm going to be quick on this one, I am participating on an entrepreneur challenge and I need to get a ton of votes on this link http://video.challengers.cl/v/c8d317 in case you guys want to help me, thanks!!!
and yea it's me the guy of the video (I was in front of 450 people, kinda nervous ) :,vvv

replies.body:
GUYS pls I need your help now more than EVER!
right now my team is in the top 3 of LIKES but we need more likes to be sure that the team that is fourth don't reach us
actually, the scores are like this:
1- This group has 1.100 likes
2- This group has 991 likes
3- This group has 955 likes (my group)
4- This group has 945 likes
so please guys if you can LIKE this and also SHARE it to as much people you can, I would be so glad!
thanks!!
